1375: Bartholomeus was born in Kerckstraet in 1375.
1392: Bartholomeus moved to Helle voet.E.1 after marriage.
Got married to Cecilia at age 18 in 1392.
1378: Lost mother at the age of 3.
1393: Lost sibling Rabburgis in 1393 when Rabburgis was 18.
Had a son with Cecilia, Lotijn, at age 18.
1394: Lost sibling Marcilius in 1394 when Marcilius was 24.
1397: Had Ricmoden move into family home at Helle voet.E.1 after marriage.
Lost daughter Machtilden when Machtilden was 0 years old.
Lost his wife Cecilia and their daughter Machtilden  while Cecilia was giving birth when he was 22.
Got married a second time to Ricmoden at age 23 in 1397.
